name: NUMINE
description: NUMINE serves as a Web 3.0 gaming platform that functions as a chain and ecosystem, allowing content developers and users to collectively influence the direction of the industry.

chains.name: numine
chains.description:
NUMINE serves as a Web 3.0 gaming platform that functions as a chain and ecosystem, allowing content developers and users to collectively influence the direction of the industry.
NUMNE offers an effective and convenient solution for developers seeking high-quality content and users desiring an optimal blockchain experience.
